otherNames: Supreme Heaven Deity, Supreme Magic Emperor: The Useless One, Supreme God Tian, 神天至尊
synopsis: “The Supreme Magic Emperor is Useless” because his human bloodline is ostracized and plotted against. He is annihilated by a joint force of the Five Clans Alliance, leading to the death of his wife, Mo Wen. At the brink of death, the Useless One comprehends the laws of heaven and earth, receiving the “Primordial Divine Soul” as a gift from the heavens, successfully resurrecting. He sets out to the human realm to uncover the fate of his human mother. The Useless One eliminates Ye Hen, the head of the Ye Clan, who sought to seize his mother’s soul. He also saves Mo Wen, who has reincarnated in the mortal world. During his investigation into the human realm, he discovers a sinister plot against him by the powerful beings who once conspired to annihilate him. The indomitable Useless One ultimately thwarts the assassination plan, unites the Five Clans, and embarks on a grand journey to resist the Immortal Clan, creating an epic saga for the Divine Clan.
